directions: Place shredded kale in a large bowl. Mix pineapple, lemon juice, and sunflower oil together in a bowl; pour over kale and toss. Sprinkle sunflower seeds over salad.
ingredients: 2 bunches kale, stems removed and leaves finely shredded
1/2 cup sunflower seeds, or to taste (optional)
title: Kale Salad with Pineapple Dressing
